exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) l, q : nat Hl : 0 < l Hlq : l + 1 < q Hq : 1 <= q Hq' : 0 < q + (q + (q + (q + 0))) r := power (q + (q + (q + (q + 0)))) 2 : nat Hr' : 4 <= r Hr : 2 <= r m, k, k' : nat f : nat -> nat Hm : m + (m + 0) < r Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k Hf4 : forall i j : nat, i < m -> j < m -> f i = f j -> i = j u1 := ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i + (f i + 0)) r) : nat u2 := ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => power (f i + f j) r + (power (f i + f j) r + 0))) : nat x : nat -> nat Hg3 : forall i : nat, x i + (x i + 0) < r Hu2 : ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => power (f i + f j) r + (power (f i + f j) r + 0))) = msum nat_join 0 (k + (k + 0)) (fun i : nat => (x i + (x i + 0)) * power i r) Hu1_u2_1 : u1 ⇣ ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => power (f i + f j) r + (power (f i + f j) r + 0))) = 0 H0 : ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => power (f i + f j) r)) = ∑ (k + (k + 0)) (fun i : nat => x i * power i r) H1 : forall i : nat, x i <= m H2 : forall i j : nat, i < j -> j < m -> f i < f j Unable to unify "?M3671 ^ ?M3672 = 0 -> False" with "∑ k (fun i : nat => power i r) = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r)".

original: assert (Hw' : w = ∑ k (fun i : nat => power i r)). { rewrite Hw. symmetry. apply sum_powers_ortho. - intros. apply Nat.pow_nonzero. lia. lia. - intros. apply Nat.pow_nonzero. lia. lia. - intros i j Hij. apply sum_power_binary_lt_inv with (q:=q) in Hw. destruct Hw as [a [Ha _]]. apply Ha. lia. - apply Hf1. } assert (cu : u = power m (2 * r)). { rewrite Hu. apply sum_powers_inc_lt. - lia. - intros i Hi. apply Hu2 in Hi. lia. - apply Hf2. } rewrite cu. rewrite Hw'. repeat rewrite Nat.pow_add_r. repeat rewrite Nat.mul_1_r. reflexivity.
